scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run migrate-reset-postgres && npm run migrate-reset-mysql && npm run migrate-postgres && npm run migrate-mysql
scripts.setup:dev: npm run migrate-reset-postgres && npm run migrate-reset-mysql && npm run generate-postgres && npm run generate-mysql && npm run seed:postgres && npm run seed:mysql
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild:dev && npm run generate-postgres && npm run seed:postgres && npm run generate-mysql && npm run seed:mysql && next build
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run migrate-deploy-postgres && npm run migrate-deploy-mysql && npm run generate-postgres && npm run generate-mysql
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild:prod && npm run seed:postgres && npm run seed:mysql && next build
scripts.build: npm run generate-postgres && npm run seed:postgres && npm run generate-mysql && npm run seed:mysql && next build
